meals.name: Ugali with Sukuma Wiki
meals.ingredients: Maize flour, water, kale, onions, tomatoes, cooking oil, salt

meals.name: Nyama Choma
meals.ingredients: Goat meat, salt, lemon, kachumbari (tomato-onion salad)
meals.culturalNote: Popular grilled meat dish often served at social gatherings

meals.name: Githeri
meals.ingredients: Maize, beans, potatoes, onions, tomatoes, cooking oil, salt
meals.culturalNote: Traditional Kikuyu dish now enjoyed nationwide

meals.name: Chapati with Beef Stew
meals.ingredients: Wheat flour, water, oil, salt, beef, tomatoes, onions, carrots, potatoes, spices
meals.culturalNote: Influenced by Indian cuisine but now a Kenyan favorite

meals.name: Mukimo
meals.ingredients: Potatoes, green peas, maize, pumpkin leaves, onions, salt
meals.culturalNote: Traditional Kikuyu dish often served during ceremonies

meals.name: Mandazi
meals.ingredients: Wheat flour, sugar, coconut milk, baking powder, cardamom, oil for frying
meals.culturalNote: Kenyan version of doughnuts, perfect with chai

meals.name: Pilau
meals.ingredients: Rice, beef, pilau masala, onions, garlic, ginger, potatoes, cooking oil
meals.culturalNote: Flavorful rice dish with Swahili influences
